member.name: T:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionCondition
member.summary: Represents an operator that uses an expression script to filter the elements of an observable sequence.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionCondition.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the expression condition.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionCondition.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description for the expression condition.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionCondition.Expression
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression that determines which elements to filter.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionSink
member.summary: Represents an operator that uses an expression script to invoke an action for each element of an observable sequence.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionSink.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the expression sink.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionSink.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description for the expression sink.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionSink.Expression
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression that determines the action to perform on the input elements.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionTransform
member.summary: Represents an operator that uses an expression script to transform each element of an observable sequence.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionTransform.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the expression transform.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionTransform.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description for the expression transform.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.Expressions.ExpressionTransform.Expression
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression that determines the operation of the transform.
